text: Tautumeitas are an Latvian all-female folk band founded in 2015. The band has six members. They represented Latvia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 in Basel, Switzerland with the song "Bur man laimi". They finished in 13th place in the final with 158 points. On 20 November 2024, they were announced as one of the twenty participants of Supernova 2025 with the song "Bur man laimi". On 8 February 2025, Tautumeitas won Supernova 2025 with their song "Bur man laimi". They were selected to represent Latvia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2025. == Discography == === Studio albums === Title Details Lai māsiņa rotājās! * Released: 29 July 2017 * Label: Lauska * Formats: CD, digital download, streaming Tautumeitas * Released: 20 June 2018 * Label: Self-released * Formats: CD, digital download, streaming Dziesmas no Aulejas * Released: 17 January 2020 * Label: Self-released * Formats: CD, digital download, streaming Skrejceļš * Released: 22 April 2022 * Label: Self-released * Formats: CD, digital download, streaming Zem saules / Under the Solar Spell * Released: 25 April 2025 * Label: Self-released * Formats: CD, digital download, streaming === Singles === Title Year Peak chart positions Album LAT LAT Air.
